summary: This document is a warranty deed recorded in Merrimack County, New Hampshire, detailing the transfer of a parcel of land from Donald A. Jackson and Juanita W. Jackson to Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust. The deed includes a detailed description of the property boundaries and acknowledges the grantors' rights.

persons.name: Donald A. Jackson
persons.context: Donald A. Jackson is one of the grantors transferring property to Richard Yospin.

persons.name: Juanita W. Jackson
persons.context: Juanita W. Jackson is the co-grantor with her husband, Donald A. Jackson, in the property transfer.

persons.name: Richard Yospin
persons.context: Richard Yospin is the trustee receiving the property on behalf of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.

persons.name: Bracken L. Scheffy
persons.context: Bracken L. Scheffy prepared the warranty deed at the request of the grantors.

connections.description: Donald A. Jackson and Juanita W. Jackson are husband and wife, jointly transferring property.
Donald A. Jackson is transferring property to Richard Yospin, who is acting as trustee.
Juanita W. Jackson is also transferring property to Richard Yospin, who is acting as trustee.
Bracken L. Scheffy prepared the deed at the request of Donald A. Jackson.
Bracken L. Scheffy prepared the deed at the request of Juanita W. Jackson.

events.title: Property Transfer
events.description: Donald A. Jackson and Juanita W. Jackson transferred a parcel of land to Richard Yospin, Trustee of The Richard Yospin Family Trust.

keyFacts: The property transferred is described as a tract of land with an area of approximately 156 acres.
The deed was recorded in the Merrimack County Registry of Deeds.
The transfer was made for a consideration of $515,750.
The deed includes detailed boundaries and descriptions of the property.
Bracken L. Scheffy prepared the deed based on information provided by the grantors.
